sentences.en: A huge fire was blazing in the fireplace.
A log fire crackled in the fireplace.
sentences.cn: 一节原木在壁炉里烧得劈啪作响.

sentences.en: A welcoming fire was burning in the fireplace.
sentences.cn: 壁炉里燃烧着暖融融的炉火。

sentences.en: An outsized photograph hung above her bedroom fireplace.
sentences.cn: 一幅巨大的照片挂在她卧室的壁炉上方。

sentences.en: I think we should wall up the fireplace.
I was forever dragging him away from the fireplace.
sentences.cn: 我老是要把他从壁炉边拉开。

sentences.en: In the evenings, we gathered around the fireplace and talked in hushed whispers.
sentences.cn: 晚上，我们聚集在壁炉周围轻声交谈。

sentences.en: In the evenings, we gathered around the fireplace and talked.
sentences.cn: 晚上，我们聚在火炉边聊天。

sentences.en: The fireplace projects from the wall rather too far into the room, taking up a lot of space.
sentences.cn: 壁炉伸出墙外太远, 占去了屋里不少地方.

sentences.en: The flames of the fire licked the sides of the fireplace.
sentences.cn: 火焰卷烧着壁炉的边缘.

sentences.en: The wall caved in to reveal a blocked-up Victorian fireplace.
sentences.cn: 墙坍塌了，露出砌在里面的维多利亚时代的壁炉。

sentences.en: There is a protruding shelf over a fireplace.
sentences.cn: 壁炉上方有个突出的架子。

sentences.en: There was a fire burning in the large fireplace.
To the right of the fireplace are various framed certificates.
sentences.cn: 壁炉的右边是各种镶框的证书。

trans.tran_en: a special place in the wall of a room, where you can make a fire
